content: Create an outline that will be used as h2 headings for a long-form blog post with a word count for each section. The title of the blog will be, The Secret of Sourdough: Why This Bread Is Actually Great for Your Gut (Plus, How to Make Your Own!). The outline should answer the questions: Is sourdough bread healthy? Why is sourdough bread good for your gut health? What are the different types of sourdough bread? What is sourdough bread? How can I make sourdough starter?
